name: SURADON
description: Compute forward or reverse Radon transform or remove multiples by using the parabolic Radon transform

parameter_descriptions.choose: 0=Forward Radon transform, 1=Data minus multiples, 2=Estimate of multiples, 3=Forward and reverse transform, 4=Inverse Radon transform
parameter_descriptions.igopt: 1=Parabolic transform, 2=Foster/Mosher pseudo hyperbolic transform, 3=Linear tau-p, 4=Abs linear tau-p
parameter_descriptions.offref: Reference maximum offset to which moveout times are associated
parameter_descriptions.interoff: Intercept offset to which tau-p times are associated
parameter_descriptions.pmin: Minimum moveout in ms on reference offset
parameter_descriptions.pmax: Maximum moveout in ms on reference offset
parameter_descriptions.dp: Moveout increment in ms on reference offset
parameter_descriptions.pmula: Moveout in ms on reference offset where multiples begin at maximum time
parameter_descriptions.pmulb: Moveout in ms on reference offset where multiples begin at zero time
parameter_descriptions.depthref: Reference depth for Foster/Mosher hyperbolic transform
parameter_descriptions.nwin: Number of windows to use through the mute zone
parameter_descriptions.cdpkey: Name of header word for defining ensemble
parameter_descriptions.offkey: Name of header word with spatial information
parameter_descriptions.nxmax: Maximum number of input traces per ensemble
parameter_descriptions.ninterp: Number of traces to interpolate between each input trace
parameter_descriptions.freq1: Low-end frequency in Hz for picking (cannot be zero)
parameter_descriptions.freq2: High-end frequency in Hz for picking
parameter_descriptions.lagc: Length of AGC operator for picking in ms
parameter_descriptions.lent: Length of time smoother in samples for picker
parameter_descriptions.lenx: Length of space smoother in samples for picker
parameter_descriptions.xopt: 1=Use differences for spatial derivative, 0=Use FFT derivative
